title: Power Function
statement:
# Power Function

Compute base raised to the power of exponent efficiently.

## Problem Description

Given integers base B and exponent E, compute B^E. Use fast exponentiation for efficiency.

## Input Format

Two space-separated integers B and E.

## Output Format

The result of B^E.

## Constraints

- -100 ≤ B ≤ 100
- 0 ≤ E ≤ 30
- Result fits in 64-bit integer
